name: Garden Painting
description:
Paint by Gardening!!

Day 4

This is an experimental painting game for #devtober (which is just an abomination of #inktober). I will update this everyday of October and you can access each day's build on rowanqueue.tumblr.com.

Controls:

1-9 to select color

Left Click to plant (if you have seeds)

Right Click to harvest/destroy plants (get more seeds) (The more experience you have with a plant, the more seeds you'll get)

P to pause

(Also I forgot to set to public until day 3 but its been since the 1st, I promise!)
